channel.title: Can Some 1 Help me make a Mini game
channel.description: i wanted to make a game dealing with barrows chest how can i make each barrows monster a stage like kill verac then it automatically puts u on next brother how can i do that?

item.title: Can Some 1 Help me make a Mini game
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

[quote=“sordsmen123, post:3, topic:227532”]it was an error i added…

f(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) //DH
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage(“Good job now kill Verac to go to Torag!”);
ppl.teleportToX = X;
ppl.teleportToY = Y;
}[/quote]

Change those with the coords that you want…

Read full topic
item.source: Can Some 1 Help me make a Mini game

item.title: Can Some 1 Help me make a Mini game
item.dc:creator: @im_a_beast im a beast
item.description:
@im_a_beast wrote:

i can help u with that…add this to npchandler.java
f(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) //DH
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.sendMessage(“Good job now kill Verac to go to Torag!”);
ppl.teleportToX = X;
ppl.teleportToY = Y;
}
hope it helped =]

Read full topic
